title: Destiny's King Fall Hard Mode Raid Is Live And Ready To Destroy You
text:
Published By: Forbes.com: Latest News - Today 
Today at 1 EST, Bungie flipped the switch and activated Hard Mode for Destiny’s King’s Fall Raid. Since the launch of The Taken King,...
